tidyplots 0.0.0.9000

    Visualizing Data
  • Changelog

Function reference

To create a plot, you typically %>% your data into the tidyplot() function. You then add components to the plot, adjust the plot, eventually split the plot into subplots and export it to file. It works best if you stick to this order: create, add, adjust, split.

Create

tidyplot()
Create a new plot

Add

Add components like data points, lines, bars or statistics to the plot.

Data points & amounts

add_scatter() add_jitter()
Add data points
add_heatmap()
Add heatmap
add_count_bar() add_count_dash() add_count_dot() add_count_value()
Add count
add_sum_bar() add_sum_dash() add_sum_dot() add_sum_value()
Add sum

Central tendency

add_mean_bar() add_mean_dash() add_mean_dot() add_mean_value()
Add mean
add_median_bar() add_median_dash() add_median_dot() add_median_value()
Add median
add_line() add_area() add_curve()
Add line

Dispersion & uncertainty

add_box()
Add boxplot
add_violin()
Add violin plot
add_sem() add_range() add_sd() add_ci() add_error()
Add error bar
add_sem_ribbon() add_range_ribbon() add_sd_ribbon() add_ci_ribbon()
Add ribbon

Statistical comparison

add_stats_pvalue() add_stats_asterisks()
Add statistics

Distribution

add_histogram() add_density_histogram()
Add histogram
add_density_curve()
Add density curve

Proportion

add_areastack_absolute() add_areastack_relative()
Add area stack
add_barstack_relative() add_barstack_absolute()
Add bar stack
add_pie() add_donut()
Add pie chart

Annotation

add_title() add_caption()
Add plot title or caption
add_text()
Add text labels
add_reference_lines()
Add reference lines

Adjust

Adjust plot properties like labels, colors, axes and size.

adjust_flip()
Flip plot
adjust_fontsize()
Adjust fontsize
adjust_size()
Adjust plot size

Split

Split the plot into a multi plot layout, eventually across multiple pages.

split_plot()
Split plot into subplots

Output

Output the finished plot or intermediate stages on the screen or to a file.

render_plot()
Render plot
save_plot()
Save plot to file

Themes

Style the plot to your liking with carefully crafted themes.

theme_tidyplot() theme_ggplot2() theme_minimal_xy() theme_minimal_y() theme_minimal_x()
Themes
remove_legend() remove_legend_title()
Remove legend or legend title
remove_padding()
Remove padding
remove_x_axis() remove_x_axis_line() remove_x_axis_ticks() remove_x_axis_labels() remove_x_axis_title()
Remove x axis or parts of it
remove_y_axis() remove_y_axis_line() remove_y_axis_ticks() remove_y_axis_labels() remove_y_axis_title()
Remove y axis or parts of it

Helpers

add()
Add ggplot2 code
format_number() format_p_value()
Format numbers and p values
all_data()
Give back all data

Data

gene_expression
Expression data from RNA-Seq study.

On this page
